attributes.action: Cash4phones needs too bide the UK law and pay all the money back that is owed and to be shut down
attributes.additional_details:
Cash4phones.co.uk is a mobile recycling company that seems to be legit at first then it's all a scam. You send your phone off, it takes them ages to recieve the phone and when they do receive the phone it either comes back as passed or falesy excused of excessive wear and tear or excessive scratching of screen.

Then they don't pay the money you are owed
There is a current Facebook group with people in the same boat as I am there's currently 7 CCJS under the main name of yemonia limited which is C4P holding address and 2CCjs under C4P trading address and they are just ingorned all the court letters they don't care about consumers they to abide by our law or get out this country. They need to pay us all back what were owed!
